title: Pagination
description: This component provides standardized styles for page counting links (First, Previous, a numbered set of pages with the current page highlighted, Next, and Last)

attributes-text.name: label
attributes-text.description: the label used for this page counter. Defaults to *Page List*.

attributes-text.name: pages
attributes-text.description: Number only, the number of pages in the list

attributes-text.name: page
attributes-text.description: Number only, the current page. If left blank, defaults to 1

attributes-text.name: parameter
attributes-text.description: the querystring parameter used to build the link, defaults to 'page'. Note that if you change this, it will also change the 'page' parameter appropriately

attributes-text.name: padding
attributes-text.description: Padding of the text inside the component

attributes.name: hidepagecount
attributes.description: Boolean value to hide the *page x of y* value

attributes.name: zerostart
attributes.description: Boolean value to determine if the page counting starts at 0 (this is a Drupal default)
